name.baseName: Papermaking ; Corrugated base paper ; Semi-chemical pulp ; Mechanical paper copying ; All sizes; NESPS2
造纸 ; 瓦楞原纸 ; 半化学浆 ; 机械法抄纸 ; 所有规模 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisFloating separation + aerobic biological treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management85，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = power consumption of wastewater treatment facilities (kWh/year) / operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours/year) / total power of wastewater treatment facilities (kW)

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisFloating separation + aerobic biological treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management85，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = power consumption of wastewater treatment facilities (kWh/year) / operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours/year) / total power of wastewater treatment facilities (kW)
technology.technologicalApplicability: 该数据集涉及使用半化学浆机械法生产适用于所有规模操作的瓦楞原纸的造纸过程。数据包括造纸过程中用于处理化学需氧量(COD)形式污染的末端处理技术的详细信息。描述的技术有化学混凝、好氧生物处理和浮选分离，这些技术单独使用或各种组合使用以实现高COD去除效率百分比。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码22,三级代码222.0,四级代码2221文件，在完整版文件中第500页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: 源文件中描述为为瓦楞原纸，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Waste wateris/
污染物指标工业废水量的末端治理技术是/。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为工业废水量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisChemical coagulation + aerobic biological treatment + chemical coagulation，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management96.94，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = 1
污染物指标化学需氧量的末端治理技术是化学混凝法+好氧生物处理法+化学混凝法，其效率为96.94，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=环保设施实际运行小时数（小时）/环保设施应运行小时数（小时）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为化学需氧量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisChemical coagulation + aerobic biological treatment + floating separation，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management94.75，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = 1
污染物指标化学需氧量的末端治理技术是化学混凝法+好氧生物处理法+上浮分离，其效率为94.75，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=环保设施实际运行小时数（小时）/环保设施应运行小时数（小时）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为化学需氧量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisFloating separation + aerobic biological treatment + chemical coagulation method，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management94.75，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = power consumption of wastewater treatment facilities (kWh/year) / operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours/year) / total power of wastewater treatment facilities (kW)
